cards.header: Mbega nofata gute isanamu yibintu bigenda binyaruka?

cards.text:
## Muriki cirwa muraza kwiga:
• Igituma ibintu bigenda binyaruka bidaheza ngo bigaragare neza kumasanamu
• Ubuhinga bwo guhagarika igikorwa kiba kiriko kirakorwa, cane cane ahantu hari umuco muke
• Gukoresha umwanya wo gufata isanamu witwa mode de priorite vitesse mururimi rw'igifaransa.
• Gukoresha umuco ufasha mugufata amasanamu bita flash.

Uhereye kubakinyi b'umupira ukaja kumiduga iriko iragenda, abari mumyerekano, abamenyesha makuru akenshi bafata amafoto y'ibiriko biragenda. Ubushobozi bwa camera bwo gufata neza buva kurugero bagirako. Nimba urwo rugero ari bukebuke cane, ntiyitunganya neza cane, Ishusho rirajamwo ibipfungu kubera baba bafashe ikikintu kiriko kiragenda. Ubunyarutsi babuharura kurugero rw'amasogonde. Ukwo ikintu kinyaruka niko n'ubwo bushobozi bwo gufotora ikintu kinyaruka bwategerezwa kuba.

(2.png)
Matelefone amwe amwe arafise ingene uyakoresha vyorohereza iyo ikintu kiriko kigenda mubunyarutsi bubayabaye bivanye n'aho kiri. Akabiranga kavyerekana bashirako umuntu ariko ariruka. Kumatelefone agezwego atagafise, hari ibintu vyinshi ushobora gukora bifasha gutora umuti. Ivyo bihera mukubanza kumenya ubushobozi bwa camera aho bugarukira hama ugakoresha uburyo bwayo nyakuri.

# Ugutunganya umuco
(3.jpg)
Ikintu gikunda kugorana iyo umuntu ariko arafotora n'ukudatundanya neza umuco.
(4.jpg)
Bishobokakw'atamuco ukwiye ukwiye wahaye iyo foto kandikirikokigenda kumuvuduko ukwiye nguyikore neza. Ntushobora gukoresha camera ibidashoboka.
(5.jpg) 
Ushaka gutunganya igikowa cawe, tegura ico uza gukora kugira haze kuba umuco ukwiye. Bisiguye kushobora gucagura umwanya kumunsi hariho nk'izuba. Bisiguye kandi kushobora gucagura ikibanza kiza kuba kirimwo umuco ukwiye ushoboka- nk'impande y'itara ryo kwibarabara, itara ry'ahantu canke kumatara y'imodoka.

(6.png)
# Gumiza hamwe camera
Ukujugumiza camera- ukutagumiza hamwe camera mugihe ufashe camera- biratuma canke bikongerereza kwonona amashusho. Ibi sivyo ukuri gusa uriko ufata amashusho y'ibintu bitaguma hamwe. Imisi yose niwifatireko camera. Ivyo birafasha kuyigumiza hamwe gusumba gusumba aho amaboko aramvuye.Bishobora gushoboka ufashe inkokora y'ukuboko gufashe camera ugufatishije kw'ivi canke kukintu kugira ugumize camera hamwe.

(7.jpg) #Wibuke gukoresha wamuco umurika uva kuvyuma bifata amasanamu. Ivyuma vyinshi vy'amaterefone ngendanwa biza bifise umuco umurika iyo uriko urafata isanamu bita flash. Irekurwa ryuwo muco rirafasha muguhagarika ico kintu canke uwo muntu uba ufashe isanamu. Umuco ufasha mugufata neza amasanamu nimiburiburi nko ku metero 3.

(8.jpg)
# Cagura umwanya wawe
Akenshi ico riko urafata kigenda kurugero rutandukanye. Abakinyi b'umupira batangura bukebuke umukino ugitangura. Imiduga igenda bukebuke mumakorosi no mugihe iduga myinshi mw'ibarabara. Abari mumyirekano barahagarara bashaka gushikiriza amajambo. cagura umwanya ibintu bigenda bukebuke. 
(9.jpg)
Ufatanije ibi n'ugutunganya umuco wawe, akenshi uronka ifoto nziza kubintu bigoye gufata n'aho haba mw'ijoro- nk'abari mumyerekano bari nko musi y'itara nk'akarorero.

(10.png)
# Hindukiza imfuruka yawe ufatiye ingene biriko biragenda
Ibigora Camera cane mugihe bitaguma hamwe ni igihe kiza cegra cadre yawe kiva iburyo kija ibubamfu canke kiva ibubamfu kija iburyo. Uburyo mpurizako bwo kubitorera inyishu babwita panning. Tumbereza Camera ugume ukurikirana ikintu cawe ingene kigenda. ukihotora nimba biba bikenewe. Ibi bigabanya umuvuduko bijanye na camera. Urashobora no guhindura imfuruka kugira ico uriko urafotora kize muri camera mumfuruka hako hoba muri cadre. Ibi bifasha camera gukurikirana neza ikintu hama ukore neza igikorwa.
co uriko urafotora utegerezwa kucitwararika. Menya gukorera mubuke bw'ibikorwa vyawe n'ibisabwa  mukubonesha. Abakinyi, imiduga, nibindi bintu bitaguma hamwe birashobora guhindura umuvuduko. Bishobora kwinjira canke bigasohoka bisaba umuco mwinshi. Ntiwipange neza mumwanya bigishoboka kugira ufate amafoto harimwo umuco mwiza kandi anyaruruka kurugero rutandukanye.

## IBINTU VYO KWIBUKA
• N'umenye igihe igihe atamuco uhariukwiye ngufate ishusho neza hama ubikorerko. Ntugume ufotoragura amafoto ubona arimwoibipfungu ngo haraza kubamwo n'imwe iza gusa neza.
•  Bishoboka, tegura igihe hari umuco ukwiye.
• Nimba camera yawe ifise ako ubanza kuregeresha kubintu binyaruka, gakoreshe.
•  gumiza hamwe camera yawe.
• Cagura umwanya mwizawo gutamwo amshusho, nko mugihe ico ufotra kigenda bukebuke.
• Koresha wamuco uza iyo ufotoye.

cards.question: Nizahe mpavu zituma isanamu itagaragara neza mugihe hariko hafatwa isanamu yibintu bigenda binyaruka?

choices.text: Ubunyarutsi bubayabaye iyo uriko urafata isanamu.
Guhindura utavyiteguriye umwanya wa camera ushira mumwanya wa video.

cards.question: Nivyo canke Sivyo: Ukutagaragara neza kw'isanamu bishobora kuba vyavuye kukukunyiganza ikiganza. Ni nkenerwa rero gufatira hamwe icuma cawe gifata isanamu mu gihe ugomba gufata isanamu yikintu kiriko kiraba.
Mega wohinyanyura gute ubwiza bwiyo sanamu iri hejuru?

choices.text: Rindira gushika igihe ico kintu kizoba kiriko kigenda buhorobuhoro kurusha.
Gukoresha ico bita zoom categekanirijwe kwegereza ikintu uba ugomba gufata isanamu.
Rindira gato gushika aho ico kintu canke umuntu ugira ufate isanamu gishika canke ashika ahantu hari umuco ukwiye.
Saba uwo muntu canke ico kintu kiba kiriko kigenda kinyaruka kwifata canke yifate isanamu.
